findings.message:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw() (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#269-272) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#271)
findings.name: arbitrary-send-eth

findings.message:
ClinicAllRefundEscrow.deposits (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#304) shadows:
	- Escrow.deposits (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#158)
findings.name: shadowing-state

findings.message:
ClinicAllRefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdrawChunk(uint256) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#494-498) should emit an event for: 
	- beneficiaryDepositedAmount = beneficiaryDepositedAmount.sub(_value) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#496)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message: ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdrawChunk(uint256,uint256) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#432-471) has external calls inside a loop: _refundee.transfer(_paymentWithoutTxFee) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#453)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message:
ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdraw(address) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#372-393) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(_data.isRefunded == false,An investor should not be refunded.) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#377)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdrawChunk(uint256,uint256) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#432-471) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(_dataCleanup.isRefunded == true,Investors in this list should be refunded.) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#465)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdrawChunk(uint256,uint256) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#432-471) compares to a boolean constant:
	-_data.isRefunded == false (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#447)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.24 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.24 (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Escrow.withdraw(address) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#179-188):
	External calls:
	- _payee.transfer(payment) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#185)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawn(_payee,payment) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#187)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdrawChunk(uint256,uint256) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#432-471):
	External calls:
	- _refundee.transfer(_paymentWithoutTxFee) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#453)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _data.isRefunded = true (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#455)
	- removeRefundeeByIndex(_dataCleanup.index) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#466)
		- refundeesList[_indexToDelete] = refundeesList[_lastIndex] (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#417)
		- refundeesList.length -- (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#418)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawn(_refundee,_paymentWithoutTxFee) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#454)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdraw(address) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#372-393):
	External calls:
	- _payee.transfer(payment) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#386)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _data.isRefunded = true (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#390)
	- removeRefundeeByIndex(_data.index) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#392)
		- refundeesList[_indexToDelete] = refundeesList[_lastIndex] (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#417)
		- refundeesList.length -- (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#418)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawn(_payee,payment) (0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#388)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
